div.p: NOTE: Imprecise implementations are allowed, where results contain some records outside the requested range. This is necessary to support many bioinformatics indexing schemes.
Valid response codes are shown in the following figure and described further in the table.

tr.td: Successfully executed request (region was studied, response is a FHIR Genomics report, that may or may not include any variants)
ERROR: Data not found (e.g. no data found for patient, no data present for requested region for patient)
